name: Strings of Light
description:
The single most important person in your life
is often the one you pay the less attention to:
Yourself.

Take a moment for introspection,
for yourself,
as you reach for the Moon and beyond.

One click to set the angle.
One click to set the power.
Then go ever higher.

A game by Bodro.
Music by Caroline Desbiens.

Made for GitHub's Game Off gamejam.
Source code available here.
